overview: Knebworth, 1990  The band's headline set at the Silver Clef Award Winners Concert held at Knebworth House on 30 June 1990.  "Shine On You Crazy Diamond" (previously released on Knebworth – The Event 1990 VHS)  "The Great Gig in the Sky"  "Wish You Were Here"  "Sorrow"  "Money"  "Comfortably Numb"  "Run Like Hell" (previously released on Knebworth – The Event 1990 VHS)
title: Pink Floyd: Live at Knebworth
